title: North Esports | Looking for Master/Challenger Top Laner!

embed.description: The latest Tweets from North Esports (@NorthEsportsNE). Esports Gaming Organisation

body:
North Esports is looking for a new TOP LANER to join our professional esports team! Currently, we have a full roster (besides top) consisting of predominantly master players (all with challenger teams experience). If you think you have what it takes and are looking for a serious team to venture into the OPL with, contact us!

Email - northesportsmain@gmail.com
IGN - North Ellui

Best of luck and looking forward to hearing from you soon ;)

North Decos - Manager of North Esports

replies.body: added. and may i just add bribery is one of the strongest laners ive ever seen
C'mon guys! This team is seriously good{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
